turns.speaker: client
turns.text: hello I'm looking for an economic auto repair service

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Which is why I see you are a couple?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, we are

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I need to know what he wants to do to the car

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to enhance the air conditioning

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: that will come at a cost of 100

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I find it economical

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: It is the cheapest place you will find in the city

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: and what quality

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: it's very good

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: really

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: We guarantee a job well done

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'll wait

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: If you are not happy with your money back

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: when they are available

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: for Monday of the coming week

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: what time can I take the car

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: early in the morning

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: and even when it will be ready

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: for Tuesday morning

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Sounds good to me

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: we know that there are people who need their ato as soon as possible

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: you're right and I am one of themyou're right and I am one of them

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: We guarantee you will be ready

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: we will see you that day

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: We will wait for it

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I think they do a good job

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: thank you very much sir

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: see you later

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: we are at your service
